podcast_summary: In this podcast, Cahil Keçisel and his guests discuss their experiences with hitchhiking. They share stories of the interesting people they've met and the adventures they've had while hitchhiking across different cities and countries. They discuss the freedom and excitement that comes with hitchhiking, as well as the safety measures they take. They also touch on the importance of trust and connection between hitchhikers and drivers. Despite encountering a few unsettling situations, they emphasize that hitchhiking can be a rewarding and memorable experience.
